title: 1 Bed & 2 Bed Studio NO LEASE required
posting_body: Affordable Round Rock extended stay hotel

Woodspring Suites® Round Rock - Austin North is an extended stay hotel located just minutes from popular Austin-area attractions like Dell Diamond stadium, La Frontera Village, Round Rock Premium Outlets and Typhoon Texas Waterpark Austin.
Business travelers can enjoy the convenience of being near Dell Technologies, Apple, AMD, Bazaar voice and Emerson Automation Solutions.
Our hotel also offers great accommodations for traveling sports teams since we're only a 15-minute drive from the North East Metropolitan Park Soccer Fields and Rock Sports Arena.
Our Round Rock hotel helps you feel at home when traveling to Central Texas.
You can stay connected with free WIFI and a flat-screen TV with cable in your furnished suite.
Each suite also features an in-room kitchen, and every-other-week housekeeping is provided for long-stay guests.
If your travel companions include a four-legged friend, we offer pet-friendly accommodations.
Hotel amenities include a fitness center, guest laundry facility, free parking and conveniently located vending machines.
